summary: This is an email from an unspecified sender to an unspecified recipient with the subject 'To read on train 2', dated September 17, 2021. It contains attachments of multiple FBI 302 interview reports from 2019 and 2020, and references an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Referenced in the email signature block as being located at the Southern District of New York office. Their specific name is not provided.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An email dated September 17, 2021, was sent with the subject 'To read on train 2'.
The email attached multiple FBI 302 interview reports from 2019 and 2020, suggesting a review of investigative materials.
The attachments include interviews from December 2019, November 2019, and February and April 2020.
The correspondence is associated with the Southern District of New York, the office that prosecuted Jeffrey Epstein.
